page.title: 14MINSTERLEY HALL
page.content: The hall was built in{1634.}It was owned for many years by the Thynne family. The Thynne family got money from selling wood from their forests,& mines at Snailbeach.Stone & wood from Caus Castle was used to extend the hall in{1653. Sir Thomas Thynne was made {Marquis of Bath.}The Thynne family had the church built & paid half towards the school. The hall is{part black & white & {part brick.}It has lovely gardens. The front{garden}slopes down to the pool. There is a{paddock}with horses in at the back. There is a{walled garden. Inside, the rooms are big with high ceilings. There is a lovely{oak {staircase.
